Message:
As the snow melts,
the warmth of spring
softly tinges the morning air.

I don my new garments,
tie back my hair,
and make my way
to the garden.

Before my eyes,
straw posts stand side by side.
I close my eyes, calm my breath,
and swing my katana.

As I slowly sheathe my blade,
the straw posts fall in silence.
Every cut, flawless.

The Duke’s words
echo in my mind—
“What matters most is
what you desire to do.”

For all the guidance you’ve
given me, what I desire is
to protect you, my lord,
and all who you call friend.

Thus, I shall ensure that my
blade never again loses its edge.

The lesson you imparted
will always remain with me.
Never again shall I dwell
on the past.

With this new attire,
I vow to serve you
with unwavering loyalty.

I, Shizu, shall bloom proudly
at your side for all eternity.

Like that white flower,
blooming quietly
amidst the snow...
